TopicTitle: Important question regarding SKYBOXES when multiple skyboxes are installed through different mods (AVP, Texture replacer, GPP/Beyond Home/any PP with skyboixes)

Articles.Content:
I tried finding answer on forums, tried specific google searches of this forums site with keywords, tried reddit, and general google searches and havent been able to find the answer I need.

Ok so I have this "problem" on a couple different installs that i have and play. Not really a problem - as in it doesnt cause any real problemsm only confusion as to which one KSP is looking at and loading. The game and all installed mods all work perfectly and seamlessly. 

On one install, which is my Galileo's Planet Pack install, I have GPP installed, obviously, Astronomer Visual Pack, and also a set of skyboxes in the TextureReplacer mod folder. Each of these 3 have their own set of skyboxes within each respective folder, each with the set of 6 images- pos-neg-x-y-z- and whatever.  It seems as if KSP is choosing to load the skybox found in the /GameData/GPP/GPP_Skybox folder. But the skybox set that I really and ultimately want loading and showing on this install is the one installed in the /GameData/TextureReplacer/Default and //GameData/TextureReplacer/EnvMap  folder.

 

Questions:

When multiple skyboxes are found throughout multiple folders within /GameData, which set does KSP choose to load? and/or which set is KSP being told/commanded to load? and How or what is telling KSP to load which skybox? if that makes sense..

Next,  Without uninstalling GPP- not an answer because I need it and this install was purposely made for it, how do I tell it to load and use ONLY the skybox set under the TextureReplacer folder??

 

**Note- I have actually tried copying the files i have in GameData/TextureReplacer/Default AND GameData/TextureReplacer/EnvMap and put them in the AVP skybox folder but renamed the same as the original files in AVP folder, but that didnt work. I thought i may have also tried that same thing with the ones in the GPP folder but i cant remember.

 

If any knowledgeable person can answer this- i have one last question. In the folder- whats the difference between the skybox set stored in TextureReplacer/Default and TextureReplacer/EnvMap???
